name: Apocalypse Warrior
description:
IMPORTANT: There are many bugs in the uploaded version, which makes the game unplayable in some places, i have fixed these bugs but cannot upload it on the website until the jam is over. If you want a bug-free experience, download the game from here.

TLDR: Download https://mega.nz/file/P6wkxQ7C#HFBcaIoWQptSIhszyLwV3O3E58EnryQca8nGITfJOLw

You are the apocalypse warrior, the city is in danger of an robot apocalypse and we need to stop this destruction to save the world. You are our last hope, soldier!

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Space - Jump

G - Switch Gun

R - Reload

Click - Shoot
